Title: Authorizes licensed clinical social workers to provide services to injured employees under workers' compensation coverage
Summary: Authorizes licensed clinical social workers to provide services to injured employees under workers' compensation coverage; establishes special authorization shall be provided by the clinical social work practice committee.
LawCode: Add ยง13-q, Work Comp L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the workers' compensation law, in relation to authorizing care and treatment of injured employees by licensed clinical social workers
